storm_sovereign.name: The Storm Sovereign
storm_sovereign.description: The ancient ruler of the storm realm, commanding lightning and wind with absolute authority. Its presence causes storms to rage across the Ether.

special_abilities.name: Thunder Judgment
special_abilities.description: Call down devastating thunder strikes on all enemies

special_abilities.name: Storm Aura
special_abilities.description: Create a storm aura that damages nearby enemies over time

special_abilities.name: Lightning Teleport
special_abilities.description: Teleport through lightning, becoming invulnerable briefly

special_abilities.name: Tempest Fury
special_abilities.description: Unleash a massive tempest that strikes all enemies

phases.description: The Storm Sovereign begins to channel the full power of the storm
The Sovereign calls upon ancient storm spirits
The Storm Sovereign unleashes its ultimate power

cloud_king.name: The Cloud King
cloud_king.description: A majestic being made of living cloud, ruling over the Cloud Kingdom with wisdom and power. Its form shifts between solid and ethereal at will.

special_abilities.name: Cloud Prison
special_abilities.description: Trap enemies in clouds, reducing their actions

special_abilities.name: Rain of Stars
special_abilities.description: Summon falling stars from the cloud canopy

special_abilities.name: Mist Form
special_abilities.description: Shift into mist, becoming immune to physical attacks

special_abilities.name: Royal Decree
special_abilities.description: Issue a decree that empowers allies and weakens enemies

phases.description: The Cloud King's form becomes more dense and threatening
The King reveals his true celestial power

thunder_titan.name: The Thunder Titan
thunder_titan.description: A colossal elemental titan forged from pure thunderstorm energy. Its footsteps shake the very foundations of the Ether realm.

special_abilities.name: Titan's Slam
special_abilities.description: A devastating slam attack that deals massive damage

special_abilities.name: Thunder Clap
special_abilities.description: Create a thunderous clap that stuns enemies

special_abilities.name: Storm Call
special_abilities.description: Summon a localized storm that attacks all enemies

special_abilities.name: Titan's Wrath
special_abilities.description: Unleash the full fury of the titan in a devastating barrage

phases.description: The Titan begins to channel the sky's fury
The Titan enters its final, most dangerous phase
